it.jrc.lt.core.component.flatpatternmatcher

Class BasicTokenTagger

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.jrc.lt.core.component.flatpatternmatcher.TokenTagger
      • it.jrc.lt.core.component.flatpatternmatcher.BasicTokenTagger

  • public class BasicTokenTagger
extends TokenTagger
    This is a very basic token tagger that assigns one or more token classes to a given token
    Author:
    Jakub Piskorski
